Texts.Eng: I kin finally make ^green;Clementine^reset; the ^orange;symbol of our love^reset; I always promised 'afore her tragic passing back in '72. Take this, and my thanks, friend.
I'm lookin' to acquire some ^orange;Silver^reset;, but I ain't no good in enclosed spaces. ^green;Rarer ores are more commonly found depth^reset;. ^orange;5 Silver Bars^reset; should be plenty.
